roasts.name: Guatemala Santa Rosa
roasts.tasting_notes: classic guat flavor. deeply sugared toasted caramel. maybe a little over the roast line for my taste. not-fruity old-school sweetness with a lot of crunchy, woodsy origin character.

roasts.name: Space Dog Blend
roasts.tasting_notes: pleasant, drinkable, a little too far over the roast line for my taste. great if you want to caffeinate while focusing on something other than your beverage.
